page.title: 08HOUSING 1
page.content: {Housing Survey}_ Duddingston Primary pupils interviewed 167 people living in the D block. Here are the results: {Q1.TYPE OF HOUSE}_Detached 36; Semi_Detached 37; Terraced 32; Flat 62; (Towerblock 8; Tenement 54). {Q2.AGE OF HOUSE}_ Post 1945 80; 1918_1945 48; Pre_1918 39. {Q3.TENURE}_ Owner occupied 110; Rented 57.(Council 44; Private Landlord 5; Other 8). {Q4.NUMBER OF ROOMS}_ Average of 4.25 excluding bathrooms and kitchens. {Q5.GARDEN}_ Yes 137; No 30. If yes is it (a) your own 118; (b) communal 19. {Q6.BUILDING MATERIALS}_ (a) Walls _ stone or artificial stone 72; brick and harling 87; wood and harling 1; other 7. (b) Roofs _ slates 109; tiles 39; other 19. {Q7.LENGTH OF STAY}_ < 5 years 64; 5 to 10 years 23; > 10 years 80.
